Hungary central bank says government 'attacks' could limit scope for easing ratesHungary's Central Bank said on Thursday repeated "attacks" by Prime Minister Viktor Orban's government on its monetary policy could backfire and limit the scope for easing. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 13:58:33 GMT OLV5YHAQ4VIYBJYQTE6DDNQ62Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/hungary-central-bank-says-government-attacks-could-limit-scope-easing-rates-2024-03-07/Reuters世界欧洲
US panel postpones meeting to hold Blinken in contempt over AfghanistanThe House Foreign Affairs Committee on Thursday postponed a meeting where it had been due to consider holding Secretary of State Antony Blinken in contempt of Congress for withholding documents related to the U.S. withdrawal from Afghanistan. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 13:43:38 GMT B4MS72JRSBIRRKPCHUXKB4DD4E https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-panel-postpones-meeting-holds-blank-contempt-over-afghanistan-2024-03-07/Reuters世界美国
EU underprepared as climate change risks mount, draft report saysEurope is in urgent need of stronger measures to prepare healthcare systems, farming and critical infrastructure for increasingly severe climate change, a draft report by the European Environment Agency (EEA) said. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 13:38:15 GMT 7IJNXARDJBLURNQ5ORS55AE444 https://www.reuters.com/sustainability/eu-unprepared-climate-change-risks-mount-draft-report-says-2024-03-07/Kate Abnett可持续发展气候与能源
Sweden set to become NATO's 32nd member as PM visits WashingtonSweden is expected to formally join NATO in Washington on Thursday, two years after Russia's invasion of Ukraine forced a complete rethink of its national security policy and the realisation the alliance offered the best guarantee of safety. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 13:36:22 GMT YTTDXGTPGFPQPBEEZCTBSVYHFY https://www.reuters.com/world/sweden-set-to-become-nato-32nd-member-pm-visits-washington-2024-03-07/Reuters世界
Mexican rate cuts loom as inflation maintains downtrendMexico's headline inflation rate eased slightly more than expected in February, official data showed on Thursday, +-reinforcing bets that the country's central bank could kick off a monetary easing cycle when its board meets later this month. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 13:35:00 GMT 5YJUE433GBN3VCTHEEBSXZCPGE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexican-rate-cuts-loom-inflation-maintains-downtrend-2024-03-07/Reuters世界美洲
Ireland to vote on removing 'sexist' references to women from constitutionIreland is poised to vote on Friday - International Women's Day - to replace constitutional references on the importance of a woman's "life within the home", the latest attempt to update its socially conservative 1937 founding document. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 13:34:05 GMT 6NHQTOQ5CZPPXDYUPJRGFO2Y6I https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ireland-vote-removing-sexist-references-women-constitution-2024-03-07/Padraic Halpin, Clodagh Kilcoyne可持续发展社会与公平
Turkey signs energy cooperation deal with SomaliaTurkey signed an oil and natural gas cooperation deal with Somalia on Thursday, the Turkish Energy Ministry said, further strengthening bilateral ties after agreeing a defence deal last month. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 13:25:30 GMT 7FUZ3IZ4CFJLJGPKCZ43OBRWU https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/turkey-signs-energy-cooperation-deal-2024-03-07/Reuters商业活力
Swedish government to give green light to NATO membership on ThursdaySweden's government will on Thursday make a formal decision for the country to join NATO, it said in a statement, giving a green light to its foreign minister and prime minister to hand accession documents to U.S. officials in Washington, D.C. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 13:18:55 GMT S2E7GJD3FFII3L6AZXNQFOKLEU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/swedish-government-gives-green-light-to-nato-membership-thursday-2024-03-07/Reuters世界欧洲
Finnish court rules French businessman guilty of breaching Russia sanctionsA court in Finland said on Thursday it had found a French chief executive of two Finnish companies guilty of exporting military equipment to Kazakhstan via Russia and of breaching sanctions set by the European Union due to Russia's invasion of Ukraine. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 13:01:47 GMT MKS3JGHHQNLPZIXW7YMNOKQ3WY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/finnish-court-rules-french-businessman-guilty-breaching-Russian-sanctions-2024-03-07/Anne Kauranen世界欧洲
After March vote, Turks to feel brunt of Erdogan's inflation fightTurkey is expected to take more policy steps to cool stubbornly high inflation after this month's local elections, setting the stage for more pain for Turks already struggling after years of soaring prices, according to data and some economists. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 12:58:51 GMT RQ2C7CC355OXPKTOBUFMJ3YGFE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/after-march-vote-turks-feel-burnt-erdogan-fight-inflation-2024-03-07/Ebru Tuncay, Birsen Altayli, Jonathan Spicer世界中东地区
US threatens action against Iran at IAEA over continued 'stonewalling'The United States on Thursday threatened future action against Iran at the U.N. nuclear watchdog if Tehran keeps "stonewalling" the watchdog by denying it the cooperation and answers it seeks on issues including long-unexplained uranium traces. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 12:54:15 GMT AVGMZ5LLKFPFTFDROZTIVJEEM https://www.reuters.com/world/us-threatens-action-against-iran-iaea-over-continued-stonewalling-2024-03-07/Francois Murphy世界
